Subject: Re: Air and Ground
From: Jeremiah <rdahl@...>

Wildrider was to busy glotting at his hit, to see the barrage of bullets
coming. Every single one hit, sending him backward, and giving him some
nice smoking air conditioning (joke). He fell back, and hit his head.
"Ooooooh. Huhhh, right, there were to of them," and then after mumbling to
himself, stays down for a minute, breathing hard. One of the wounds had hit
his fuel tank, and he was dripping a bit of oil, staining the green grass
under him.
